price: (61) It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
